name: Data licensed for all uses
description: Data licensed for re-use, including commercial uses. This profile only filters on license, no "quality" filters are applied.

categories.name: Exclude records without a fully open license
categories.label: open-license
categories.description: Open licensed data, excludes records or data sources where the license is unclear, unknown, has additional requirements beyond attribution or is non-commercial use restricted

qualityFilters.description: Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC 4.0 (Int)"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC 3.0 (Aus)"
Exclude all records where License is "Creative Commons - license at record level"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Int)"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0 (Int)"
Exclude all records where License is "other"
Include only records where License is "CC-BY-SA 4.0 (Int)"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC 3.0 (Au)"
Exclude all records where License is "CC BY-NC-Int"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC-Int"
Exclude all records where License is "Custom"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC 2.5 (Int)"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-NC-Aus"
Exclude all records where License is "CC-BY-ND 4.0 (Int)"

categories.name: Exclude records with no license information
categories.label: license
categories.description: Include only records with license information

qualityFilters.description: Include only records with a license value
